mapper.select: select id as "id", user as "user", title as "title", summary as "summary", content as "content", liked as "liked", lastedit as "lastEdit", deleted as "deleted", createtime as "createTime" from t_artical where id = #{id} and deleted = "N"
mapper.insert: insert into t_artical (user, title, summary, content, lastedit, createtime) values (#{user}, #{title}, #{summary}, #{content}, NOW(), NOW())
